d1e3.d: The company is captured by trolls.

d1e10.d: This is the background of the dwarf city of Erebor.

d1e17.d: The company arrives at Rivendell to consult with Elrond.

d1e31.d: This is where the story opens to Bilbo Baggins and he meets the rest of his companions, 60 years after Smaug destroyed Erebor.
